overview:
Current Vice President at SpectorSoft

Past Director Engineering at Stac VP Engineering at Ocean Isle Software Director Engineering at Logicraft

Education University of New Hampshire

Summary Entrepreneur involved with three previous successful start-up companies. A pioneer in the remote control software field for Windows by developing Carbon Copy and Reachout.

Co-founded SpectorSoft and head the technical and business management duties.

SpecialtiesSuccessful software design and development. Start-up operations and business development.

Experience Vice President at SpectorSoft

Director Engineering at Stac

VP Engineering Ocean Isle Software

Director Engineering Logicraft
